offer_summary.company_name: VML Enterprise Solutions Sp. z o.o.
offer_summary.job_description: A highly skilled and motivated Python Developer is needed to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in web development using Python and related frameworks, designing, implementing, and maintaining web applications that meet the needs of our clients.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Python 3.x and either FastAPI/Flask framework
Hands-on experience with RDBMS (Postgres, Oracle or others) and ORM
Significant experience of working with Agile methodologies
requiered_skills: Python development experience with a focus on web applications/services
Strong knowledge of Python 3.x and either FastAPI/Flask framework
Hands-on experience with RDBMS (Postgres, Oracle or others) and ORM
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following best practices and industry standards
Significant experience of working with Agile methodologies
nice_to_have_skills: GCP or any other Cloud experience
benefits: Salary depending on presented skills: 12,000 - 16,800 PLN/month (B2B contract)
Fully remote job as well as possibility to visit our offices in PoznaĹ„, Katowice and Bydgoszcz
Work equipment with delivery to your door
